name: Colourful Dots
description: This work is a recreation of QQL (2022) by Tyler Hobbs. It is my first generative art. I started with creating one circle, then adding it into a grid, and at the end, adjusting colors and randomness. I decided to change the colors to give the artwork a bit different feel than the original artwork.

name: Neon Craziness
description: Neon Craziness was created based on Colourful Dots. By allowing looping and experimenting with bold colours, a new artwork has been created, not at all giving the same feel as default version.

name: Shades Of Purple
description: This animation was created based on Lines.

name: Lines
description: Lines are based on Regrowth (2021) by Tyler Hobbs.

name: B&W Floating
description: This picture was created as an alternation to lines and uses 50 shades of grey.

name: Fun Circles
description: The picture was created based on Colourful Dots.

name: Blue Perlin Noise
description: The picture is a recreation of an artwork called Retrun Zero (0.8) Blue.

name: Aquamarine Sand
description: This picture is a variation of an artwork called Retrun Zero (0.8) Blue.

name: Electric
description: This picture is a second variation of an artwork called Retrun Zero (0.8) Blue.

name: Roots
description: This picture is a second variation of an artwork called Retrun Zero (0.8) Blue.

name: Generate By Yourself
description: An artwork where the user is the artist.
